details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.1.2 String objects - Even number of characters
details.description: Hexadecimal strings shall contain an even number of non-white-space characters

rule.description: Hexadecimal strings shall contain an even number of non-white-space characters

error.message: Hexadecimal string contains odd number of non-white-space characters
